text: ab yadi ve tumase jhagade to kah do, "mainne aur mere anuyaayiyon ne to apane aapako allaah ke havaale kar diya hain." aur jinhen kitaab milee thee aur jinake paas kitaab nahin hai, unase kaho, "kya tum bhee islaam ko apanaate ho?" yadi ve islaam ko angeekaar kar len to seedha maarg par gae. aur yadi munh mode to tumapar keval (sandesh) pahuncha dene kee zimmedaaree hai. aur allaah svayan bandon ko dekh raha hai
